events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on the highway during rush hour, requesting claim initiation.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the reported incident details mention a car collision.
A claims agent with expertise in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle the clientâ€™s auto claim efficiently.
Client received official acknowledgment of their auto accident claim and was informed about the next steps.
Agent requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and medical bills for any injuries related to the accident.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including accident report and repair estimates for processing.
Investigation was commenced to verify damages, circumstances of the collision, and liability factors.
Investigation concluded confirming customer was not at fault and extent of vehicle damages were assessed.
The insurer proposed a settlement offer covering the repair costs along with a rental car reimbursement.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the offer and the speed of claim processing throughout the investigation.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company following acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for vehicle repairs and related expenses was issued directly to the repair shop and customer.
Claim was officially closed after all payments completed and customer confirmed repair satisfaction.
